main event: A civilian observed a round light in the sky over McArthur, Ohio, on July 12, 1965, for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a satellite but was later classified as a UFO,The observation was made from a ground perspective,The observer noted that the light appeared white and became very bright at one point,The object moved steadily from West to East at an estimated 60 degrees elevation,The conclusion was drawn by the observer that it was likely ECHO I satellite.
sighted object: a round light in the sky
